comment: So far so good. I'm aging it on the oak staves for 11 months so it won't be done until November. I sampled it recently and it was pretty delicious. Lighter on the bourbon side than I was hoping but I was going to add the cocoa nibs and coffee beans for like a week at the end and I'll probably soak those in bourbon before adding
Does the oak come through with the staves or do you not really taste that at all either?  I had a KBS recently and it's all I can think about brewing.
Let us know how it turns out.
